content:
Ref: https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/197730-Da-Vinci.20PDex.20Drug.20Formulary/topic/the.20official.20profile.20url

Short version: The examples in the drug formulary IG are correct, but the examples in the download bundle have wrong profile names due to a change of case. Based on the update frequency of the publisher, this is ancient history. Not sure whether this is worth looking into, or just advising you to go have a beer.
I'm just not sure. I'll keep an eye on it when we publish new things. The error is in the downloads? where exactly?
I downloaded the examples.zip and all of the examples had .../Davinci... as the profile URL instead of .../davinci...
